name: BiaSky Pool Billiard Pro
description:
Bia Sky is a free game and is the best Billiards game online. With simple gameplay you can play billiards anytime, anywhere with your phone have connect Internet. The outstanding features of the Biasky:

- The game has many game modes for players to choose

- 3D graphics sharp, very beautiful.

- Play with billiards players around the world

- Play for free, daily coin donation through lucky wheel and small tasks without worrying about running out of money.

- Professional pool table (billiards) interface, many different table styles, many different types of sticks, vivid effects.

- Always update more and more minigame in this: minipoker, mini slot, high or low, shake tree, quick math, casual billiard, and many game slot.

- This is a game similar to the billiards game you play outside, but you can also accurately calculate the power and spin power of the hits. There are many attractive and extremely interesting game modes waiting for you ahead.

Wish you have fun playing the game and do not forget to rate 5 * support the developer!
